title: Best Pizza
instructions: Mix together the flour and salt. Proof the yeast in warm water. Add yeast water to the ï¬‚our and salt mixture, plus the olive oil. Knead for 5 minutes. Let rest for 1 hour. Blitz tomatoes, Grade cheese. Roll out dough, top with blitzed tomatoes and cheese, Bake in SOOF oven for 8 minutes.
